title: Adele is pictured sneaking out of Drake's 33rd birthday party
text:
Adele looked teary-eyed as she was pictured sneaking out of Drake's star-studded 33rd birthday party, which was held at Goya studios in Hollywood on Wednesday.

The Rolling In The Deep singer, 31, joined the likes of Diddy, 49, Future, 35, and Chris Brown, 30, at the exclusive hotspot and looked incredible in a black off-the-shoulder dress.

But there was no sign of Adele's rumoured new boyfriend, Grime artist Skepta, 37, - the pair are said to have been on a string of dates following her split from husband Simon Konecki, 45.

Hello... ! Adele looked teary-eyed as she was pictured sneaking out of Drake's 33rd birthday at Goya studios in Hollywood on Wednesday after partying with Diddy and Chris Brown

Started From The Bottom Now We're Here: The Canadian musician was joined a host of his A-list pals on the night as he partied in style

The singer was surrounded by her security detail as she attempted to keep a low profile after the party and she had a couple of pals with her in the car.

She looked naturally beautiful and concealed her face with a black feathered bag after showing off her svelte figure at the bash.

Adele and Drake have been friends for some time.

Big night: She looked a little bleary-eyed as she chatted to her pal in the car

Set Fire To Your Rain: The singer was surrounded by her security detail as she attempted to keep a low profile after the party and she had a couple of pals with her in the car

Stunning: Adele showed off a glimpse of her glamorous manicure and diamond ring as she prepared to head home

Chatty: She looked a little bleary-eyed as she conversed with her friend in her Mercedes

Not on the list? There was no sign of Skepta on the night who is rumoured to be dating Adele and is also a good friend of Drake's

Back in February it was reported that the superstar pair visited a vape lounge and rented out an entire 32-lane bowling alley in Studio City during a night out and ate at Jerry's famous deli.

This came months after the singer made an unexpected appearance at his show.

In October last year, Drake, who refers to himself as Champagne Papi on social media, was said to be thrilled after Adele watched him perform at a Los Angeles show without his prior knowledge.

It's P. Diddy! Musical icon Sean Combs was pictured leaving the bash wearing a crisp white suit over a black shirt

Capturing the moments: He had a pal sitting in the front of a car taking his picture while he sat on the phone

Nothing to see here: A pal began to shut the curtains on the window of his car as he headed off home

Now friends: Drake's former nemesis Chris Brown was also at the party - he dated Rihanna (as did Drake) in 2008 but he left her with a split lip and badly bruised following a row in 2009

Taking to Twitter shortly after his performance, Adele raved: 'Oii Champagne Papi blew my mind tonight! Best production I've ever seen hands down and way up there with one of my favorite shows of all time. Huge love.'

Returning the compliment, a clearly stunned Drake later thanked the singer after reposting her tweet on Instagram.

Captioning the post, he wrote: 'Oiiiiiii don’t f***ing get me gassed right now I love this woman and she came to the show. Thank god nobody told me I would have been SHOOK (sic)'

Blond ambition: Future looks dapper in a suit and tie while leaving Drake's birthday

Doggy Dogg: Snoop was also at the party, wearing a casual green tracksuit

The pair are understood to have enjoyed a firm friendship on social media before meeting in person, with fans often calling for them to collaborate.

On Monday, RiRi celebrated with Drake at another of his birthday celebrations, held at Poppy nightclub.

In 2018, RiRi famously spoke to Vogue about her on-off former lover, Drake, 'We don’t have a friendship now, but we’re not enemies either. It is what it is.'

An E!News source said: 'The pair, 'looked like they were having fun together as friends' in the club.

Well done: Adele claimed Drake's Los Angeles show on October 13 last year was one of the best she had ever seen
